text: Kylian Mbappé Lottin (; born 20 December 1998) is a French professional footballer. He plays for Real Madrid in La liga. He plays as a forward for French Ligue 1 Monaco club and the France national team. At the age of 19, he has been marked the best young player in the world. Mbappé made his senior debut for France in 2017. Before that he was representing them at under-17 and under-19 levels. At the 2018 FIFA World Cup, Kylian Mbappé became the youngest French player to score at a World Cup. He also became the second teenager, after Pelé, to score in a World Cup Final. France won the tournament and he was the second-highest goalscorer. He received the Best Young Player Award for his performances. He moved to PSG for a sum of 160 million Euros in the summer of 2018. Thereafter he stayed with the club for a prolonged and eventful saga period upto 2024 before getting his dream move to Real Madrid. His transfer to real Madrid was free. ==At Paris Saint-Germain football club == Mbappé had his last game for Paris Saint-Germain football club, in May 2024. The team's last game of the season was on May 25.https://www.vg.no/sport/fotball/i/Mn3j0B/ingen-mbappe-scoring-men- avsluttet-med-cupgull-for-psg.
